Verses: 1 karththar En Aandavarai Nokki: Naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakki Podumvaraikkum, Neer Ennudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarum Endraar.
2 karththar Seeyonilirundhu Umadhu Vallamaiyin Sengolai Anuppuvaar; Neer Ummudaiya Saththurukkalin Naduve Aalugaiseyyum.

3 umadhu Baraakkiramaththin Naalile Ummudaiya Janangal Manappoorvamum Parisuththa Alangaaramumullavargalaayiruppaargal; Vidiyarkaalaththu Karppaththil Pirakkum Panikku Samaanamaai Ummudaiya Yowvana Janam Umakku Pirakkum.
4 neer Melgisedhekkin Muraimaiyinpadi Endrendraikkum Aasaariyaraayirukkireer Endru Karththar Aanaiyittaar; Manam Maaraamalumiruppaar.
5 ummudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththilirukkira Aandavar, Thamadhu Kobaththin Naalile Raajaakkalai Vettuvaar.
6 avar Jaadhigalukkul Niyaayandheerppaar; Ellaa Idangalaiyum Piredhangalaal Nirappuvaar; Visthaaramaana Dhesangalinmel Thalaivargalaayirukkiravargalai Norukkippoduvaar.
7 vazhiyile Avar Nadhiyil Kudippaar, Aagaiyaal Avar Thamadhu Thalaiyai Eduppaar.
